upgrades.title: Documentation URL Change
upgrades.summary: Claude Code documentation has moved from docs.anthropic.com to code.claude.com/docs

upgrades.title: MCP External Data Sources
upgrades.summary: Docs mention MCP support for Google Drive, Figma, Slack integrations
upgrades.notes: ANALYSIS: AIProjects has 3 active + 4 on-demand MCPs. Slack/Drive/Figma not currently needed. Good ecosystem awareness.

upgrades.title: Native Install with Auto-Updates
upgrades.summary: New native installer available with automatic background updates
upgrades.notes: ANALYSIS: Current npm install works well. Migration risk outweighs benefit. Consider during major version upgrade.

upgrades.title: LSP Tool - Language Server Protocol Integration
upgrades.summary: Code intelligence features: go-to-definition, find references, hover documentation. Added in v2.0.74.
upgrades.notes: WORKING: TypeScript/JS LSP functional. Requires explicit prompting ('Use LSP' or 'Using LSP tool'). Setup: typescript-language-server installed, typescript-lsp plugin enabled, tweakcc applied. Python LSP not configured.
upgrades.recommendation: DONE - prompt with 'Use LSP' for LSP operations

upgrades.title: Claude in Chrome Extension (Beta)
upgrades.summary: Control browser directly from Claude Code via Chrome extension. Added in v2.0.72.
upgrades.current_state: Using Playwright MCP for browser automation
upgrades.notes: ANALYSIS: AIProjects uses Playwright MCP (21 tools) via gateway. Chrome extension offers different UX - interactive vs programmatic. A/B test recommended.

upgrades.title: Automatic Skill Hot-Reload
upgrades.summary: Skills in ~/.claude/skills or .claude/skills now update immediately without restarting. Added in v2.1.0.
upgrades.notes: Already benefiting from this feature. No action needed.

upgrades.title: Sub-agent Forking for Skills
upgrades.summary: Skills can run in forked sub-agent context with 'context: fork' setting. Added in v2.1.0.
upgrades.current_state: Not using forked context for skills
upgrades.notes: Could improve isolation for complex skills. Evaluate for parallel-dev and other heavy skills.

upgrades.title: Language Configuration Setting
upgrades.summary: New 'language' setting for Claude's response language (e.g., language: 'japanese'). Added in v2.1.0.
upgrades.notes: Not needed - English is preferred. Available if needed for internationalization.

upgrades.title: MCP Donated to Agentic AI Foundation
upgrades.summary: Anthropic donated MCP to open-source community and established the Agentic AI Foundation (Dec 2025).
upgrades.notes: Industry development. May lead to more standardized MCP servers and broader ecosystem support.

upgrades.title: Plugin Git SHA Pinning
upgrades.summary: Support for pinning plugins to specific git commit SHAs for exact version control. Added in v2.1.14.
upgrades.notes: Useful for stability. Consider pinning critical plugins to known-good versions.

upgrades.title: History-Based Bash Autocomplete
upgrades.summary: Type partial command in bash mode, press Tab to complete from bash history. Added in v2.1.14.
upgrades.notes: Quality of life improvement. Already available in current version.

upgrades.title: Context Window Blocking Limit Fixed
upgrades.summary: Context window blocking limit was too aggressive (~65%), now fixed to ~98%. Fixed in v2.1.14.
upgrades.notes: Important fix. Should see better context utilization in long sessions.
